attributes.action: Remove proposed statutory right of entry by council or other Government officials or private companies, to enter private homes to note, assess or otherwise gain information regarding personal property, assets or other data of a private and personal nature.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This iniquitous intrusion into the rights of personal privacy is completely unwarranted and cannot be justified in the name of national security or any other scaremongering tactic

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
